name: Glowink
description:
In a dark neo-world, you have to make it bright. But be carefull, you're not the only one who think you can bring your light to it.

2players fight in a random arena. The goal is to enlight the most the environment with your glowing ink thanks to your moves (which cover the ground) and the balls you shoot each second (which cover the walls).

To play:

  • Yellow player press [space]
  • Red player press [enter]
